item.title: The Alpha Combos
item.description: Memorizing the Alpha Combos # Memorizing the alpha combos may seem difficult. It is easier to learn the letters in groups. There are patterns that will help with this: Notice the relationship between the first B chord option and C. They are only one key different and the B chord looks a little like a b when viewed from the side. Note that the second B chord is a little easier to hit so you may want to migrate to using that chord once you have everything memorized.
